casebody.data:
AMERICAN LUNG ASSOCIATION, et al., petitioners,
v.
EME HOMER CITY GENERATION, L.P., et al. No. 12-1183. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013. Motion of the federal parties to deem the Court of Appeals' Joint Appendix to be Volumes 2 thru 8 of the Supreme Court's Joint Appendix granted. Justice ALITO took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
